import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-socios', templateUrl: './socios.component.html', styleUrls: ['./socios.component.css'] }) export class SociosComponent { codigos : string[]=[]; codigo : string ='' boton: string = "Añadir socio" addToArray(){ this.codigos.push(this.codigo) } }
